name: Mercedes AMG S63 Cabriolet 2021
description: Mercedes-Benz S-Class AMG S63 4MATIC+ Cabriolet is a new-released Convertible Car in Bangladesh, 4.0L Twin-Turbo V8 Gas Engine, and All-Wheel Drive 9-speed automatic transmission. It is working on Rack-Pinion Steering, Adaptive, self-leveling 4-wheel multilink AMG Adaptive Sport Suspension based on AIRMATIC Suspensions. The vehicle comes with 4 Leather Seats and 21.1 gallons of Fuel Tank Capacity. Coming to performance, It has a more powerful and more efficient engine giving 603 horsepower at 5500 rpm and 664 lb-ft torque at 2750 pm. The Mercedes AMG S63 car travels for 14 Mileage in the City, 24 Mileage on the Highway, and 17 Mileage of Combine. The rate of Co2 emission is 10.3 Tons per Year
